mapper.select:
select count(c.*) as deviceTotal, s.id as sceneId, s.scene as sceneName from cw_base_scene s left join cw_base_camera c on c.sceneId = s.id and c.state = 0
AND FIND_IN_SET(s.id,${sceneIds})
group by s.id

select count(r.*) as captureTotal, s.id as sceneId, s.scene as sceneName from cw_base_scene s left join cw_base_camera c on c.sceneId = s.id left join ss_snap_record r on r.device_id = c.id
AND FIND_IN_SET(s.id,${sceneIds})
group by s.id
